name: Space Whalers
description:
WASD - Movement

E - Interact with terminals

Left Shift - Toggle camera view

An entry for the Entry for Ryan Laley Games Spring Jam with Connections as theme.

Play as an robot doing the brain role of a space whale.

The real whale was the scope creep that got me in this jam, but the knowledge and softwares that I got to know on this little adventure were priceless. Just hope you guys like the concept of the game and who knows, maybe with some time I will fix this game and give it a purpose, till there keep playing.
